mapper.select: SELECT p.order_id, p.order_date, p.receiver_name, p.all_price FROM order_product p WHERE p.cust_id = #{custId} ORDER BY p.order_date DESC

SELECT d.product_id, p.product_img AS product_img, p.product_name AS product_name, d.order_qt AS order_qt, p.product_price AS product_price, (d.order_qt * p.product_price) AS subtotal FROM order_detail d JOIN product p ON d.product_id = p.product_id WHERE d.order_id = #{orderId}
SELECT p.order_id, p.order_date, p.receiver_name, p.all_price FROM order_product p WHERE p.order_id = #{orderId}
